title: Oshiri Kajiri Mushi
synopsis: A funny video about a magical bug that likes to bite the people's derriere. The song was intended to encourage people who live in big cities to spontaneously interact with each other.
related_anime: ['Oshiri Kajiri Mushi (TV)', 'Oshiri no Yama wa Everest']
staff: [['UrumaDelvi', ['Theme Song Lyrics', ' Theme Song Composition', ' Animation Director']], ['Matsumae, Kimitaka', ['Theme Song Arrangement']]]
